short_summary: Modify closing time for Aircraft Charter Services
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: For Aircraft Charter Services, required supporting documentation must be submitted by January 18th, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST. Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will not be accepted.
full_summary:
===============

**Aircraft Charter Services**

**Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** WS3753315787

**Publication Date:** December 8, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** January 18, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Solicitation Information**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer for Aircraft Charter Services. This solicitation is for the rental of freight aircraft with an operator.

**Key Dates**

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2028
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 18, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Procurement Information**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact Mr. Glover, Kingsley (SPAC/PSPC) at kingsley.glover@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice**

Please note that the closing time for bid submission has been amended to 14:00 EST on January 18, 2024. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. Please refer to the attached solicitation document for more details.

**Notice URL**
